casebody.data:
BEAUFORT BOE
v.
BEAUFORT BD. OF COMM. No. 106PA08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2008. Garris Neil Yarborough, Fayetteville, for Beaufort Co. Commissioners. Richard Schwartz, Raleigh, for Beaufort Co. BOE.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 656 S.E.2d 296.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of March 2008 by Plaintiff (Beaufort Co. BOE) to Dismiss Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of April 2008."
